price: Dájúdájú wọ́n ti fi ìmísí ránṣẹ́ sí wa pé, dájúdájú ìyà ń bẹ fún ẹni tí ó bá pe òdodo ní irọ́, tí ó sì kẹ̀yìn sí i.”
arabic: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā anna al-ʿadhāba ʿalā man kadhaba watawallā
